entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Dementors are described as 'casting their freezing aura over the place' and standing like 'faceless sentinels'. They are also mentioned as being in the courtroom with Harry.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as seeing Hermione shudder and slipping into the courtroom behind her. He is also mentioned as having been interrogated for improper use of magic in a different room.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is described as being white-faced and sitting on one side of Umbridge on the high raised platform. She is also mentioned as shuddering when she sees something.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is described as sitting on a high raised platform with Yaxley and Hermione on either side of her.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is described as sitting next to Umbridge on the high raised platform.

entities.name: muggleborn registration commission
entities.description: The Muggleborn Registration Commission is mentioned as sitting behind a balustrade on the high raised platform.

entities.name: cattermole
entities.description: Mrs. Cattermole is described as being white-faced and sitting in the courtroom.

entities.name: dungeon
entities.description: The dungeon is mentioned as a place where Hermione walks alone into.

entities.name: courtroom
entities.description: The courtroom is described as being much smaller than the one Harry was interrogated in. It also gives a claustrophobic sense of being stuck at the bottom of a deep well.

relationships.description: Harry slips into the courtroom behind Hermione.
Umbridge sits next to Yaxley on the high raised platform.
Umbridge sits next to Hermione on the high raised platform.
